name: Office Rollers
description:
This is a submission to the VGDC Spring 48 Hour Game Jam under the theme: Restricted Movement.

You have been given a job as an office worker on the tallest pillar in the world.  Roll yourself to important work documents in order to do your job.  Watch the edge though!  It's a long way down.

CONTROLS
HOLD SPACE - Slow down time and charge up your roll
RELEASE SPACE - Resume time and start your roll in the direction you are currently facing

Music from BenSound.com
